name: poker-staff-dashboard
description: Poker Staff Dashboard for Guest Relation Executive

scripts.start:clear: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const cacheFile = path.join('node_modules', '.cache', '.eslintcache'); try { fs.unlinkSync(cacheFile); } catch(e) {}" && react-scripts start
scripts.clear-cache: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const cacheFile = path.join('node_modules', '.cache', '.eslintcache'); try { fs.unlinkSync(cacheFile); console.log('Cache cleared!'); } catch(e) { console.log('Cache file not found or already cleared.'); }"
